dmca.title: Copyright infringement
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Kris Bloom [mailto:Kris@streetsourcemag.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 16, 2005 1:44 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright infringement

We have a problem where (what we assume to be) your client sportrucks.com is
blatantly violating our copyright. There are many examples, but one stands
out. Go to
http://www.sportrucks.com/memberlogin.asp?returnURL=addownerprofile.asp ..
You will see a login form that looks allot like ours..
http://www.streetsourcemag.com/myaccount.aspx .. But what makes it an
obvious forgery is that if you notice, the words "find it." under "Forget
your UserName?" links to our website. They copied it and forgot to change
the URL of that link. Also, if you view the source of the page and search
for "streetsource" you will see the JavaScript variables are still named
like ours... an obvious forgery. This individual is aware that we are on to
him and is making small changes to make his forgery less obvious but we have
screens shots of the original site the way it was.

There are many examples of things like this throughout there site still. We
have contacted the company who developed this site and they have confirmed
that they were given instructions to copy our site. We are currently filing
lawsuit against this company for the incident but the contact information
for this person has shown to be false. this has caused us to run into a dead
end. We would like the site shut down if possible. If not, please advise us
of anything you can do to help.

Thanks,

Kris Bloom
Street Source Magazine
President/CEO
Http://www.StreetSourceMag.com
Http://www.StreetSourceInteractive.com
